attributes.action: consider the possibility for greater protection of wildlife and natural resources
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We in Britain are currently living under what can only be described, in terms of the Government's attitude to our own landscape and wildlife, as a totalitarian regime. I am sure you will be aware that, during the last 10 years, the Government has been responsible for the seizure of over 500 square miles of woodland for the purpose of urban redevelopment. I believe this situation has gone far enough, and that a halt ought to be called immediately!!!

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
